title: Pepsky.All-In-One.v3.5.1.18
description:
Pepsky All-in-One is an ultra tool collection that is packed with various features of CD burning, CD copying, making audio / video discs, formats-between conversion for audio/video and CD / DVD ripping.

? It backups your file data into CD / DVD.
? It helps you to burn MP3 discs or its ISO image files.
? It helps you to burn WMA discs or its ISO image files
? It helps you easily to burn such popular music format files as MP3, WAV, WMA, AAC, AU, AIF, APE, VOC, FLAC, M4A, OGG into the music disc which can play with Automobile CD player, Home VCD and home DVD PC. It also produces BIN, APE, SVD - format music disc image files.
? It helps you easily to duplicate the music discs, Data discs, VCD/SVD/DVD on hand, and also supports for copying nearly all the copy-protection discs, which include css-protected DVD, into a blank CDDVD.
? It burns disc image files whose formats, such as SVD, ISO, BIN, APE, NRG, CCD, IMG, DVD, MDS, or MDF, are used frequently into a blank CD/DVD.
? It helps you to make the music, data, video CD/DVD, or copy-protection game disc an image file with the format of ISO, BIN, APE, SVk etc. And It also supports for making of the disc image file for the copy-protection game of SafeDisk, LaserLock, Securom, SecuromNew, Cd-Crops, Starforce, Tags, or Cd-checks.
? You can easily convert various audio or video formats such as MPEG-4, AMV, AVI, ASF, SWF, DivX, Xvid, RM, RMVB, FLV, SWF, MOV, 3GP, WMV, PMP, VOB, MP3, MP2, AU, AAC, AC3, M4A, WAV, WMA, OGG, FLAC etc. Not only are the volum adjustment, time-cutting, and video-cutting supported, but also the VCD/SVCD or DVD image file can be generated. And also your various digital devices for iPod, iPhone, PSP, Zune, Mobile phone etc. are provided with rich conversion solutions, bringing you to enjoy musics and movies you love, anywhere and anytime.
? It converts DVD audio or video discs into various audio or video formats, such as MPEG-4, AVI, ASF, SWF, DivX, Xvid, RM, RMVB, FLV, SWF, MOV, 3GP, WMV, PMP, VOB, MP3, MP2, AU, AAC, AC3, M4A, WAV, WMA, OGG, FLAC etc. It is the DVD Rip software that supports " ONE DVD ONE FILE " first in the world.
? It converts various populous audio formats, such as MP3, WAV, WMA, AAC, AU, AIF, VOC, FLAC, M4A, OGG, RA etc., and supports for each chapter being converting into one song.
? It compacts DVD9 disc (Capacity with approximately 8.5G ) into a blank DVD5 (Capacity with approximately 4.5G ) disc , with remaining of higher enjoying of a video.
? It helps you easily to convert the songs in a music CD into popular audio formats, such as MP3, WAV, WMA, AAC, AU, AIF, APE, VOC, FLAC, M4A, OGG etc.
? It helps you to make any conversion between the popular audio formats of MP3, WAV, WMA, AAC, AU, AIF, APE, VOC, FLAC, M4A, OGG etc.
? It helps you to check the information of the drives and discs in the computer.

New features of Pepsky All-in-One in 3.5.3.218 Version
? include new features of Pepsky CD/DVD Copy in 3.5 version.
? include new features of Pepsky CD/DVD Ripper in 3.5 version.
? include new features of Pepsky Video Converter in 3.5 version.
? include new features of Pepsky Free Audio Converter in 3.5 version.
? include new features of Pepsky Free CD Maker in 3.5 version.
